ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend it to people interested in law, human rights, and post-conflict reconstruction. I would say it's a good introduction, but not an in-depth look, at international criminal justice and the politics associated with it.
I would definitely recommend the course. It would be great if the course were a full-term.
Yes, this course gives you a brilliant insight in the contemporary problems of international criminal law and politics.
Yes, if they were interested in the content of the course

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: As I alredy had certain amount of knowledge in international criminal law, this course has given me the most valuable political background of it.
